Text:
(I harbor no delusions about my physical
capabilities.)

(Likewise, I am not conceited enough to think humbly
acknowledging my own meager worth itself is an act of
any great value.)

(I evaluate matters impartially, even where I'm
concerned. After all, seeing things from a broad
perspective is precisely what my current role
demands.)
(Mitsugoshi—)

(A vital commercial endeavor that single-handedly
funds the Shadow Garden's activities... I have been
charged with seeing that its pieces fit together and
operate in a profitable manner.)

(I've never been able to hold a candle to any of the
other Seven Shadows when it comes to combat. I will
never be of service to the Garden on that front...
Painful though it is to admit, it's the truth.)

(This is particularly so with Delta, who has
extraordinary fighting abilities I can never hope to
match, no matter how I try. She's always amused at
how I trip over nothing sometimes.)

(But I can live with that...because I have
Mitsugoshi...a role that is mine alone.)

(Delta may laugh at my expense, but she has no
concept of the uses or value of money. I'm guessing
she doesn't even comprehend the importance of
strategy, either.)

(We Seven Shadows each have our part we're suited to
play. None of us are superior or above the others...
aside from Lady Alpha, that is.)

(...That's because Lady Alpha is special. It is she
who stands beside our magnificent lord, effectively
leading the Shadow Garden.)

(She is one of the Seven along with the rest of us
yet uniquely in a category all her own. That's why
she's able to serve in our lord's place.)

(Master Shadow seeks neither glory nor fame, but only
to realize his grand purpose...)

(I do what I must to ensure his work goes unimpeded,
tasks that none other than I can perform—)
But is there really anything I can do?
(On that day, we were flung into the past—)

(A time 1,000 years removed from our own, when the
demon Diablos and historical heroes still lived and
vampires ran rampant.)

(The fight is much closer at hand than in our era...
It truly is a time where might makes right.)
(Even Master Shadow was not immune to this...)

(I was of little to no help when everyone was
engaging the enemy. Even now with my comrades injured,
I'm too weak to do anything...)
(What use am I in an era, a world such as this?)

(My combat abilities may be poor, but I have
Mitsugoshi. When the right people are in the right
places, everyone brings results in their respective
fields, and we all stand on equal footing.)
(But then...)

(...of what value am I in a world where there is no
Mitsugoshi?)

(Master Shadow has always praised my business acumen,
and it is there that I've found merit in my
existence.)

(What can I do now, with my whole reason for being
stripped away?)
Is there...nothing I can do?

(Nothing... Without Mitsugoshi, "Gamma the Weak" is
utterly useless.)

(Why am I weak? Why can't I have the strength to
crush our foes like Delta does?)

(If...if only I were stronger... A head for business
strategy and a knack for making money aren't enough
to make it in this era.)

(I can't fulfill my duties as one of the Garden's
Seven Shadows.)
(Helpless, dead weight... I truly am Gamma the Weak.)
(No... No, I can't accept that...)
(I need...power...)

(Power enough that no one can ever mock me, power to
survive in this era... Power to make me the equal of
anyone, even Delta and Lady Alpha, power that Master
Shadow must surely acknowledge—)
That is what I desire!!!
Ngh...agh...ah?!

(What...is...this?! My body...feels strange...
I can't control...my magic—)
*pant, gasp*...!
I-Incredible...

Strength is welling up within me... My body feels so
light... Such... Hee, heeheehee, wonderful power!

With this power, those who wronged me in the Shadow
Garden will... Wait. No... Eeheehee, no, that's not
the way... That's not it, Gamma... Eeheehee, ahahaha!

With this power, I can knock everyone in the Shadow
Garden to the moon!

I'm better than that muscle-brained oaf Delta or
Alpha, who stands beside our lord with that oh-so-smug face!
The same goes for all those other pissants, too!!!

No one is ever going to laugh at me again! Or call me
dead weight!

They had their fun at my expense, but now I'll show
them all just how valuable I am!
